statements: SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, maintenance_description FROM eco_friendly_vehicles_maintenance_schedule
SELECT * FROM eco_friendly_vehicles_maintenance_schedule WHERE vehicle_type = 'Hybrid'
SELECT maintenance_type, scheduled_maintenance_date FROM eco_friendly_vehicles_maintenance_schedule ORDER BY scheduled_maintenance_date ASC
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type FROM eco_friendly_vehicles_maintenance_schedule WHERE scheduled_maintenance_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_description FROM eco_friendly_vehicles_maintenance_schedule
SELECT * FROM eco_friendly_vehicles_maintenance_schedule WHERE vehicle_type='Hybrid' ORDER BY scheduled_maintenance_date DESC
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, maintenance_description FROM eco_friendly_vehicles_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type='Oil Change' ORDER BY vehicle_id ASC
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, maintenance_type FROM eco_friendly_vehicles_maintenance_schedule WHERE scheduled_maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY maintenance_type, vehicle_type DESC
SELECT maintenance_type, COUNT(*) FROM eco_friendly_vehicles_maintenance_schedule GROUP BY maintenance_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT DISTINCT vehicle_type FROM eco_friendly_vehicles_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_description LIKE '%check%' ORDER BY vehicle_type
SELECT * FROM maintenance_record;
SELECT id, maintenance_type, cost FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_record WHERE cost > 100;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE schedule_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, mechanic_name FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY mechanic_name DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, schedule_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change' ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT mechanic_name FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE vehicle_id = 100 ORDER BY mechanic_name ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance FROM maintenance_schedule GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT maintenance_type, AVG(cost) AS avg_cost FROM maintenance_record GROUP BY maintenance_type ORDER BY avg_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM EcoFriendlyVehicles;
SELECT manufacturer, model, year FROM EcoFriendlyVehicles WHERE fuel_type = 'Electric';
SELECT manufacturer, model, year FROM EcoFriendlyVehicles WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, model, year, fuel_type FROM EcoFriendlyVehicles WHERE manufacturer = 'Tesla' AND fuel_type = 'Electric';
SELECT location_name, address, city, state FROM GarageLocations WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT manufacturer, model, year FROM EcoFriendlyVehicles WHERE fuel_type = 'Electric';
SELECT manufacturer, model, year FROM EcoFriendlyVehicles WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT manufacturer, model, year, maintenance_schedules FROM EcoFriendlyVehicles WHERE manufacturer LIKE '%Toyota%' AND JSON_LENGTH(maintenance_schedules) > 0;

SELECT vehicle_id, manufacturer, model FROM EcoFriendlyVehicles JOIN MaintenanceRecords ON EcoFriendlyVehicles.vehicle_id = MaintenanceRecords.vehicle_id WHERE MaintenanceRecords.maintenance_type = 'Oil Change' ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT * FROM GarageLocations WHERE state = 'California' AND city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT * FROM fleet_management WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT brand, model, year FROM eco_friendly_vehicle WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT id, maintenance_type, mechanic_id FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_record WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT id, schedule_date, vehicle_id FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE mechanic_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, schedule_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE vehicle_id = 3 ORDER BY schedule_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_record WHERE cost > 1000 AND maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT maintenance_type, COUNT(id) AS total_maintenances FROM maintenance_schedule GROUP BY maintenance_type HAVING COUNT(id) > 2;
SELECT brand, model, year, color FROM eco_friendly_vehicle WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY brand, year DESC;
SELECT * FROM eco_vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, production_year FROM eco_vehicles WHERE is_electric = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'inspection';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_cost > 1000 ORDER BY maintenance_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM eco_vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, production_year FROM eco_vehicles WHERE is_electric = true;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM eco_vehicles JOIN maintenance_schedule ON eco_vehicles.vehicle_id = maintenance_schedule.vehicle_id;
SELECT personnel_name, department, experience_years FROM maintenance_personnel WHERE experience_years > 5 ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT log_timestamp, log_message FROM maintenance_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
